typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		currency_code_from as string,
		currency_code_to as string,
		currency_id_from as decimal(38,18),
		currency_id_to as decimal(38,18),
		day as timestamp,
		rate as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> hlpExchRate
source(output(
		dim_key as long,
		top_code as string,
		top_description as string,
		cur_code as string,
		cur_description as string,
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd as decimal(12,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> dimCurrency
hlpExchRate, dimCurrency lookup(currency_code_from == cur_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpCurFrom
LkpCurFrom select(mapColumn(
		day,
		rate,
		cur_dim_key_from = dim_key,
		each(match(startsWith(name,'currency_')),
			'source_'+$$ = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns, dimCurrency lookup(source_currency_code_to == cur_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpCurTo
LkpCurTo select(mapColumn(
		day,
		rate,
		cur_dim_key_from,
		source_currency_code_from,
		source_currency_code_to,
		source_currency_id_from,
		source_currency_id_to,
		cur_dim_key_to = dim_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
